sentences.sContent: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.sCn: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.sContent: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.sCn: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.sContent: We existed on a diet of rice.
...Boundaries exist in virtually all human relationships...
...Old technology sometimes continues to exist because of its reliability...
...ledge economy where professional roles change rapidly and many college students are preparing for positions that may not even exist yet...
...there exist some dishonest and incredible online retailers who may do further damages to buyers’ interests...
...these plastic products will exist for a long time...

synos.tran: 存在；生存；生活；继续存在

phrases.pCn: 以…形式(或形态)存在，作为…而存在，

words.tran: 存在主义的；有关存在的；存在判断的
存在，实在；生存，生活；存在物，实在物

trans.tranOther: to be present in a place or situation
